content:
A Block Vote 2 for the CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange (CARIN Blue Button) IG ballot (2020-Feb-BLUEBUTTON R1 STU) was submitted for review during the regularly scheduled Financial Management call on June 30.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss an item. Additionally, you can discuss during the FM WG call on June 30.

A link to the comments in JIRA can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CAR/CARIN+BB+IG+Block+Vote+2
